ygData.subject: Re: The Seige
ygData.msgSnippet: It wasnt a mode Yan, I said he missles exploded on the right and left side of Iron Raptor, not on her body at all. Marine s eyes bulged with the optic blast

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

It wasnt a mode Yan, I said he missles exploded on the right and left side of 
Iron Raptor, not on her body at all.

       Marine's eyes bulged with the optic blast ready to strike at Iron 
Raptor, and they did. The sets of blasts cut thin green lines through the 
smoke at the beast. 
       Acid splattered Marine, and small holes began to bubble on his armor 
as the acrid smell and steam rose. Grabbing onto his plasma assult riffle 
with both hands, he aimed, and released a spitfire of plasma, 25 shots, at IR.

       Craken was in his assault chapper , and picked up Prowl even before he 
left the ground. Craken, large and armed with a dual chain gun and missle 
launchers, sent four missles scattering at Prowl as his chain gun lit up 
sending 25 shots each.

       Adrax is sent to the ground as one missles explodes on his back, 
opening a nasty slit. He turns over and counter attacks with 15 blasts from 
two angry optics.

       Hell Beast see's the discharge by Killfest on a small wrist radar, 
turns, and slams Inferno into them. With a bright blaze Infern ofel to the 
ground with his head comically spinning on his neck. Hel lBeast goffed, and 
fired his chain gun at Killfest.
       Meanwhile, The blasts fired by Element, not to sure which one, burst 
around them. The Four Predacons began to run, taking numerous hits.

--part1_45.4cf832d.28050dd8_boundary
